urlencoded.description: Author email. Email must be valid.
Some text message. Can not be longer than 100 character.

request.description:
Creates message and validate them. Returns Object with only one field '_id' of created message.

Example responce: 
```
{
    "_id": "5ad6e5541d8d9e00147e3595"
}
```

query.description: For search the right message in DB by id.

request.description:
Finds and returns a message on the id, which is specified in the address.

Example of responce:
```
{
    "_id": "5ad6e5541d8d9e00147e3595",
    "email": "email@gmail.com",
    "text": "Hello, World! What's up?",
    "createdAt": "2018-04-18T06:27:32.217Z",
    "updatedAt": "2018-04-18T06:27:32.217Z"
}
```

Returns an array of Objects with messages for a given pagination. Maximum one array can contain ten Objects.

Example responce:
```
[
    {
        "_id": "5ad6e5541d8d9e00147e3595",
        "email": "email@gmail.com",
        "text": "Hello, World! What's up?",
        "createdAt": "2018-04-18T06:27:32.217Z",
        "updatedAt": "2018-04-18T06:27:32.217Z"
    },
    {
        "_id": "5ad6eb0f1d8d9e00147e3596",
        "email": "daenerys@gmail.com",
        "text": "Hello everyone, i am Daenerys Targaryen! What's up with my dragons?",
        "createdAt": "2018-04-18T06:51:59.110Z",
        "updatedAt": "2018-04-18T06:51:59.110Z"
    }
]
```
